article_title: Congressional candidates debate U.S. role in accepting refugees
article_text:
Nine candidates hoping to succeed U.S. Rep. Lois Capps faced off in a candidate forum Friday

Other topics included campaign finance reform, climate change and federal education funding

The two candidates with the most votes in the June 7 primary election, despite party affiliation, will advance to the general election Nov. 8.

article_metadata.news-keywords: 24th district, congressional, congress, election, candidates, forum, aauw, atascadero, achadjian, fareed, carbajal, schneider, ostrander
article_metadata.description: The nine candidates hoping to succeed retiring U.S. Rep. Lois Capps faced off in a forum hosted by the American Association of Univeristy Women on Friday at the Atascadero Library.
article_metadata.title: Congressional candidates debate U.S. role in accepting refugees | The Tribune
